txt.en: The Moria Orcs hold control over the Grand Stair, and at their head are Igash the Fanatic and his Devoted. Alongside them is a host of fearsome Orcs from the heart of Moria.

'Igash's throne dais is patrolled by his master guard. These Orcs seem to be of the same breed found throughout Khazad-d√ªm, but are stronger and more deadly. 

'We must be diligent in dealing with these Orcs, lest they bring their war-plans to fruition.

'You will find the Orcs beyond the bridges of the Grand Stair, north-east of the Orc-watch.'
The Orcs can be found at the Grand Stair, north-east of the Orc-watch.\n\nAvar has tasked you with defeating the Orcs who guard the throne of Igash.

'With their numbers dwindling, it will not be long before the Moria Orcs are naught more than a memory in this area. Your efforts are exemplary, [placeholder], and you will be known throughout these halls as a hero to all.\n\n'I thank you for your efforts thus far.'
Avar is at the Orc-watch, south-west of the Grand Stair.\n\nYou should return to Avar with news of your success.
'Be cautious as you travel through the Grand Stair and defeat as many of these foes as you can.'
Talk to Avar at the Orc-watch
